description: Contract employee for Astral and Shinto specialist. She was part of the Katsuragi, an old and world renowned family of Shinto practitioners, however was brought to Astral after she ran away from home. She is the youngest of Astral`s members and refers to the others as family despite their lack of blood relation. Mikan`s side jobs include writing charms and conducting ceremonies.
name: Katsuragi Mikan
